lead_paragraph: Driving in the dark between Catania and Gela in Sicily, the Italian photographer Massimo Cristaldi couldn't help gaze at something twinkling in the distance.
snippet: Massimo Cristaldi is fascinated by islands of light created by U.S. Navy complexes in the darkness of the Italian countryside, as Kerri MacDonald reports.

headline.main: In the Italian Night, Islands of Light

abstract: Massimo Cristaldi is fascinated by islands of light created by U.S. Navy complexes in the darkness of the Italian countryside, as Kerri MacDonald reports.
